name: Mars Defender (Psychic Software)
description:
A story-driven arcade-adventure across the Solar System, Mars Defender is set in the 2130s, at a time when humankind is making its first tentative steps into colonization of other planets. 

As a pilot of Mars Defense, you will fly the best spacecraft of the 22nd century as you defend the Inner System from attack and then engage the enemy to the Asteroid Belt and beyond.

This game was a moderate success on smartphones in 2011. To celebrate its 10 year anniversary, I'm making it available for free on Windows and OSX. Mars Defender provides a retro-styled overhead 3D view, in the style of classic Asteroids games.
